name: Square Relative
description:
For better perfomance, it might be better to download the game

A puzzle game where you move one of the 2 or 3 superposed maps to lead the flag to the player.

It's my first uploaded game, made for the Finally Finish Something game jam. I hope you'll like it!

Credits:

Music:

  • An Untitled Song - My friend MakeSense
  • Meeting the princess - Goose Ninja (Space Music Pack)
  • Warped vehicles - Ansimuz (Warped Vehicles)

Fonts:

  • mx611 by Daniel Linssen
  • Thaleah by Tiny Worlds
